name: Carmageddon TDR 2000

files.goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Carmageddon TDR2K/TDR2000.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /LANG=English /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: goginstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
